children.text: Located 5 minutes' walk away from the shops and restaurants of Fisherman's Wharf, The Wharf Inn offers guest rooms with free WiFi.  Guests at this completely non-smoking motel can enjoy starting the morning with a free cup of coffee and a newspaper. Free guest parking is available on site.

Guest Score & Reviews
Based on 66 reviews
No A/C, a little old and it shows at some points but I would book it again without thinking twice (if not travelling with a girl that has very high expectatiins).
